mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, base_info_id, name, desc, run_deal_user_id, notice_user_id, run_type, status, type, limit_time, init_api_id, run_api_id, save_api_id, trans_api_id, result_type, result_id, sync, suggest from sys_order_node where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_order_node( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, base_info_id, name, desc, run_deal_user_id, notice_user_id, run_type, status, type, limit_time, init_api_id, run_api_id, save_api_id, trans_api_id, result_type, result_id, sync, suggest) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{baseInfoId}, #{name}, #{desc}, #{runDealUserId}, #{noticeUserId}, #{runType}, #{status}, #{type}, #{limitTime}, #{initApiId}, #{runApiId}, #{saveApiId}, #{transApiId}, #{resultType}, #{resultId}, #{sync}, #{suggest})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_order_node where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
